se.idsec.sigval.commons.algorithms

Class NamedCurveRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.idsec.sigval.commons.algorithms.NamedCurveRegistry

  • public class NamedCurveRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    Registry over supported named EC curves. Any EC curve can be specified using the defined curve parameters of EC cryptography. Some curves with specific parameters have been assigned OID identifiers. These are called "named curves"
    Author:
    Martin Lindstr√∂m (martin@idsec.se), Stefan Santesson (stefan@idsec.se)
